name: TurboFly HD
description:
Make sure to also download our other brand new game, Yolo Fish, for free!

Discover what "speed" really means in TurboFly HD, brand new 3D futuristic racing game!

• Pure speed.

Take control of one of five hovercrafts in three unique race modes in a fusion of pure speed, antigravity, pulsing techno, and combat.
Want even more speed ? Try the Endurance mode where your ship never stops to speed up: go as fast as possible without crashing your ship!

• Pure controls.

TurboFly HD makes the best possible use of the accelerometer to allow you to drive at insanely high speed in the most precise way.
Feel free to choose the touch-screen controls if you prefer!

• Pure fun!

Explode your opponents with missiles and mines.
Play against your friends or defy the best players in the world in the multiplayer mode!
Make the highest score possible in the leaderboards and achievements.


Features:

- Super-fluid 60 frames-per-second action
- Weapons such as missiles and mines
- 23 events in Career mode
- 8 different tracks
- 3 game modes (Race, Pursuit, Endurance)
- Up to 8 CPU opponents
- Intense online multiplayer!
- Leaderboards and achievements
- Accelerometer or touch screen controls
- Great music from SupraDarky and DJ SynthR
